column4: suggestion : freeNX or maybe the linux version of rDesktop = xcrmdcp

allows you to run X over ssh
pendantic

you are being pendantic

I need thist only for  linux -> linux actually.  From linux A  I want to use X applications on linux B.  I can use ssh -X but I do not get the "desktop" thing, thats only problem
will still work. but one thing first : are you aware of what the ssh + screen combo is for ?
what do you mean?  We want to run graphicall applications
i know. but you can't maintain sessions with xdcmp like you can with screen
or like you can with rdesktop
you mean that the session will close on server when client disconnects? that is fine
google : ubuntu xdmcp howto
